thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: I recently purchased a hat on-line. Unfortunately the hat was not what I really expected and I returned same. Absolutely no problems with the original purchase procedure (including prompt delivery) and subsequent return. I would not hesitate in dealing with Country Attire in the future.
